meanings.definition: A sight that is visually striking or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was an eyeful of bright colors and sparkling lights.
meanings.sent2: The Grand Canyon offers an eyeful of breathtaking natural beauty.
meanings.sent3: The clown's outfit was an eyeful of mismatched patterns and colors.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night was an eyeful of twinkling lights and towering buildings.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibition was an eyeful of creativity and talent.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is visually attractive or appealing.
meanings.sent1: The movie star was an eyeful on the red carpet in her glamorous gown.
meanings.sent2: The garden was an eyeful of vibrant flowers and lush greenery.
meanings.sent3: The dessert table was an eyeful of delicious treats and sweets.
meanings.sent4: The vintage car was an eyeful of polished chrome and sleek curves.
meanings.sent5: The model's runway walk was an eyeful of confidence and grace.
